root.name: Guilty Gear XX Λ Core Plus
root.description: IntroductionGuilty Gear XX Λ Core Plus (pronounced Guilty Gear XX Accent Core Plus) is a 2D fighting game developed by Arc System Works and published by Aksys (Arc System Works in Japan and pQube in Europe) for the PlayStation Portable and PlayStation 2 on April 7, 2009. Originally released in Japan for the PlayStation 2 on March 27, 2008, the fifth iteration of Guilty Gear XX (after Guilty Gear XX Λ Core) adds two unlockable characters from the original Guilty Gear (Justice and Kliff Undersn) and various new game modes. This game is succeeded by the Guilty Gear XX Λ Core Plus R.The game was later released for the Wii on May 12, 2009, the Xbox 360 (via Xbox Live Arcade) on October 24, 2012, and the PlayStation 3 (via PlayStation Network) on December 4, 2012.CharactersThere are a total of 25 playable characters in Guilty Gear XX Λ Core Plus:Sol BadguyKy KiskeBaikenDizzyZato 1/ EddieAnji MitoAxl LowChip ZanuffMayPotemkinTestamentOrder-SolJamFaustZappaA.B.ASlayerMillia RageVenomI-noJohnnyRobo-KyBridgetJustice (new, unlockable)Kliff Undersn (new, unlockable)
